task.title: How to Turn on the Projector
task.shortdesc: This section will describe how a customer uses the projector in an Airclassroom rental.

taskbody.context: This task was adapted from Epson's "Turning on the Projector" webpage.

step.cmd: Connect the power cord to the projetor's power inlet
Plug the power cord into an electrical outlet.
Press the power button on the projector or on the remote control to turn on the projector
